auth.anonymouslyTooltip: You will be able to vote but not be able to create rooms
auth.codeDescription: We have sent a 6-digit code to the {{email}}.

disconnectDialog.title: Connection closed
disconnectDialog.description: The application has been inactive for more than 15 minutes and you have been disconnected from the server. To continue working, reconnect or refresh the page.

user.notVerifiedDescription: Account not verified. If you log out or are inactive for 30 days, all data will be deleted. You cannot use your account on more than one device, nor can you create rooms.

snackbar.updateNotification: A new version of the app is available!
snackbar.deleteRoom: The room has been deleted, you have been moved to the room list
snackbar.googleAlreadyLinked: This google account is already linked to the user

rooms.noRoomsTitle: Create a room to get started
